mapper.select: SELECT admin_number, admin_id, admin_passwd FROM tbl_admin WHERE admin_id = #{id} AND admin_passwd = #{pw}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum, subquery.* FROM (SELECT DISTINCT u.user_number, u.user_nickname, u.user_tier, u.user_phone, u.user_join_date, u.user_ben_cnt, max(nvl(ben_status, 0)) over(PARTITION BY u.user_nickname ORDER BY ben_number ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND UNBOUNDED FOLLOWING ) AS BEN_STatus FROM tbl_user u LEFT OUTER JOIN tbl_ben b ON u.user_number = b.user_num WHERE u.user_nickname LIKE '%'||#{searchedUserNick}||'%' ORDER BY user_number) subquery) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
SELECT count(*) FROM tbl_user WHERE user_nickname like '%'||#{searchedUserNick}||'%'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum, subquery.* FROM ( SELECT f.forum_number, f.forum_category, f.forum_title, f.forum_date, u.user_nickname, u.user_tier FROM tbl_forum f INNER JOIN tbl_user u ON f.user_number = u.user_number WHERE f.forum_category = '모집' order by f.forum_number desc ) subquery ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
SELECT count(forum_number) FROM tbl_forum WHERE forum_category = '모집'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum, subquery.* FROM ( SELECT f.forum_number, f.forum_category, f.forum_title, f.forum_date, u.user_nickname, u.user_tier FROM tbl_forum f INNER JOIN tbl_user u ON f.user_number = u.user_number WHERE f.forum_category = '모집' AND u.user_nickname LIKE '%' || #{searchedPartyNick} || '%' order by f.forum_number desc ) subquery ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
SELECT COUNT(FORUM_NUMBER) FROM tbl_forum f JOIN tbl_user u ON f.user_number = u.user_number WHERE f.forum_category = '모집' AND u.user_nickname LIKE '%' || #{searchedPartyNick} || '%'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum, subquery.* FROM ( SELECT f.forum_number, f.forum_category, f.forum_title, f.forum_date, u.user_nickname, u.user_tier FROM tbl_forum f INNER JOIN tbl_user u ON f.user_number = u.user_number WHERE f.forum_category NOT LIKE '모집' order by f.forum_number desc ) subquery ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
select count(forum_number) from tbl_forum where forum_category NOT LIKE '모집'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum, subquery.* FROM ( SELECT f.forum_number, f.forum_category, f.forum_title, f.forum_date, u.user_nickname, u.user_tier FROM tbl_forum f INNER JOIN tbl_user u ON f.user_number = u.user_number WHERE f.forum_category NOT LIKE '모집' AND u.user_nickname LIKE '%' || #{searchedCommunityNick} || '%' order by f.forum_number desc ) subquery ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tbl_forum f JOIN tbl_user u ON f.user_number = u.user_number WHERE f.forum_category != '모집' AND u.user_nickname LIKE '%' || #{searchedCommunityNick} || '%'

SELECT COUNT(USER_TIER) count FROM TBL_USER WHERE USER_TIER = #{tier}
SELECT COUNT(FORUM_CATEGORY) count FROM TBL_FORUM WHERE FORUM_CATEGORY = #{category}
